comments: n! / (n-th triangular number) is an integer.a(k)=A072668(k) for k>0.
references: J. D. E. Konhauser et al., Which Way Did The Bicycle Go?, Problem 98, pp. 29; 145-146, MAA Washington DC, 1996.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,2000
maple: for n from 1 to 300 do if n! mod (n*(n+1)/2) = 0 then printf(`%d,`,n) fi:od:
prog: (PARI) { f=1; t=0; n=-1; for (m=1, 4000, f*=m; t+=m; if (f%t==0, write("b060462.txt", n++, " ", m)); if (n==2000, break); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 05 2009]
